languages.text: "Устав требует, чтобы вопросами службы блюстителей занимался Мастер дисциплины, однако ни для кого не секрет, что среди блюстителей и офицеров у Сенешаля есть... любимцы. Способные личности, имеющие право обратиться к нему за наставничеством".

"The ship's regulations state that the Master-at-Arms is responsible for resolving all matters related to the ship's enforcers. And yet it is no secret that the Seneschal has a tendency to... show partiality. Those enforcers and officers whom he has deemed particularly promising are at times given permission to approach him for tutelage."
languages.original_text: "Устав требует, чтобы вопросами службы блюстителей занимался Мастер дисциплины, однако ни для кого не секрет, что среди блюстителей и офицеров у Сенешаля есть... любимцы. Способные личности, имеющие право обратиться к нему за наставничеством".

languages.text: "Den Statuten des Schiffs zufolge seid Ihr als Waffenmeisterin für alle Angelegenheiten hinsichtlich der Enforcer des Schiffs verantwortlich. Allerdings ist es kein Geheimnis, dass der Truchsess mitunter ... befangen ist. Die Enforcer und Offiziere, die er für besonders vielversprechend hält, erhalten gelegentlich die Erlaubnis, ihn um Rat zu bitten."
languages.original_text: "The ship's regulations state that the Master-at-Arms is responsible for resolving all matters related to the ship's enforcers. And yet it is no secret that the Seneschal has a tendency to... show partiality. Those enforcers and officers whom he has deemed particularly promising are at times given permission to approach him for tutelage."

traits.locale_text: "Den Statuten des Schiffs zufolge seid Ihr als Waffenmeisterin für alle Angelegenheiten hinsichtlich der Enforcer des Schiffs verantwortlich. Allerdings ist es kein Geheimnis, dass der Truchsess mitunter ... befangen ist. Die Enforcer und Offiziere, die er für besonders vielversprechend hält, erhalten gelegentlich die Erlaubnis, ihn um Rat zu bitten."

languages.text: « Le règlement du vaisseau stipule que c'est aux capitaines d'armes de résoudre tous les problèmes liés aux prévôts. Et pourtant, il est de notoriété publique que le sénéchal a tendance à faire preuve de... partialité. Les prévôts et officiers qu'il juge particulièrement prometteurs se voient parfois accorder le privilège de solliciter son appui. »
languages.original_text: "The ship's regulations state that the Master-at-Arms is responsible for resolving all matters related to the ship's enforcers. And yet it is no secret that the Seneschal has a tendency to... show partiality. Those enforcers and officers whom he has deemed particularly promising are at times given permission to approach him for tutelage."

traits.locale_text: « Le règlement du vaisseau stipule que c'est aux capitaines d'armes de résoudre tous les problèmes liés aux prévôts. Et pourtant, il est de notoriété publique que le sénéchal a tendance à faire preuve de... partialité. Les prévôts et officiers qu'il juge particulièrement prometteurs se voient parfois accorder le privilège de solliciter son appui. »

languages.text: «Las normativas de la nave estipulan que la responsabilidad de resolver todos los asuntos relacionados con los guardias de a bordo recae sobre la maestra de armas. Y sin embargo, no es ningún secreto que el senescal es propenso a... dispensar un trato parcial. Los guardias y oficiales que considera particularmente prometedores suelen gozar del privilegio de acudir a él en busca de tutela».
languages.original_text: "The ship's regulations state that the Master-at-Arms is responsible for resolving all matters related to the ship's enforcers. And yet it is no secret that the Seneschal has a tendency to... show partiality. Those enforcers and officers whom he has deemed particularly promising are at times given permission to approach him for tutelage."

traits.locale_text: «Las normativas de la nave estipulan que la responsabilidad de resolver todos los asuntos relacionados con los guardias de a bordo recae sobre la maestra de armas. Y sin embargo, no es ningún secreto que el senescal es propenso a... dispensar un trato parcial. Los guardias y oficiales que considera particularmente prometedores suelen gozar del privilegio de acudir a él en busca de tutela».

languages.text: 「本船の規則では、マスター・アット・アームは本船のエンフォーサーに関するあらゆる問題を解決する責任があります。ですが、家令長に…偏見の傾向があるということは、周知の事実です。彼が特に有望であると判断したエンフォーサーや士官は、時に直接指導を受ける許可が与えられます」
languages.original_text: "The ship's regulations state that the Master-at-Arms is responsible for resolving all matters related to the ship's enforcers. And yet it is no secret that the Seneschal has a tendency to... show partiality. Those enforcers and officers whom he has deemed particularly promising are at times given permission to approach him for tutelage."

traits.locale_text: 「本船の規則では、マスター・アット・アームは本船のエンフォーサーに関するあらゆる問題を解決する責任があります。ですが、家令長に…偏見の傾向があるということは、周知の事実です。彼が特に有望であると判断したエンフォーサーや士官は、時に直接指導を受ける許可が与えられます」

languages.text: “根据这艘船上的规定，戒律大师负责解决所有与执法者相关的问题。然而所有人都很清楚，总领会对一部分船员有着特殊的……偏袒。有的时候，他会允许那些他认为特别有前途的执法者与军官来他身边，由他亲自进行指导。”
languages.original_text: "The ship's regulations state that the Master-at-Arms is responsible for resolving all matters related to the ship's enforcers. And yet it is no secret that the Seneschal has a tendency to... show partiality. Those enforcers and officers whom he has deemed particularly promising are at times given permission to approach him for tutelage."

traits.locale_text: “根据这艘船上的规定，戒律大师负责解决所有与执法者相关的问题。然而所有人都很清楚，总领会对一部分船员有着特殊的……偏袒。有的时候，他会允许那些他认为特别有前途的执法者与军官来他身边，由他亲自进行指导。”

languages.text: "Geminin mevzuatı, geminin infazcılarına dair tüm hususları çözmede Silahtar'ın sorumlu olduğunu belirtir. Yine de Seneşal'in... Taraf tutma eğilimi gösterdiği sır değil. Seneşal'in bilhassa gelecek vadettiğini düşündüğü infazcılar ile subayların eğitim amacıyla kendisine zaman zaman başvurmalarına müsaade ediliyor."
languages.original_text: "The ship's regulations state that the Master-at-Arms is responsible for resolving all matters related to the ship's enforcers. And yet it is no secret that the Seneschal has a tendency to... show partiality. Those enforcers and officers whom he has deemed particularly promising are at times given permission to approach him for tutelage."
